history.title: Version History
history.highlight_1: Full List Customization: Take full control of your interface, making it cleaner and more organized.
history.highlight_2: Redesigned Friends Page: A more intuitive and complete social experience.
history.highlight_3: Detailed and Smart Profile: Your profile now reflects your tastes and time invested with much more precision.
history.highlight_4: Enhanced Social Sharing: Redesigned sharing cards to stand out on any social network.
history.highlight_5: Compare with Friends: Discover affinities and compare stats with your friends in a whole new way!
history.list_management_1: Enable and Disable Lists: No more visual clutter! You can now completely disable the lists you don't use.
history.list_management_2: List Selection at Registration: New users can now choose which lists they want to activate during the account creation process.
history.list_management_3: Reorder Lists: Organize as you wish! We've added the ability to drag and reorder your lists in the main menu and dropdown.
history.social_1: Restructured Friends Page: The section has been redesigned with tabs for "Friends" and "Add Friends", unifying the search and request management.
history.social_2: Notifications Icon: A new bell icon in the top bar will alert you to new friend requests.
history.social_3: Improved Usability: The friends list interface has been enhanced to make it clearer that the name and photo are clickable.
history.profile_1: Detailed Statistics: The profile now displays the time spent separately for anime, movies, and series.
history.profile_2: Favorites by Category: Each list now has its own favorites section on the profile.
history.profile_3: "Favorite of Favorites": Select your "main" favorites to have them featured at the top of your profile.
history.sharing_1: New "Print" Design: The sharing card has been redesigned in a vertical format, optimized for social media.
history.sharing_2: Sharing by List: Generate a "print" for each of your statistics lists individually.
history.compare_1: Comparison Area: We've introduced a new section where you can compare yourself with your friends through interactive charts and data visualizations.
history.version_1_2_2_feature_1: GeneralFull List Customization: It is now possible to enable, disable, and reorder media lists.
history.version_1_2_2_feature_2: SocialRedesigned Friends Page: Tabbed interface for better organization and a new flow for adding friends and managing requests.
history.version_1_2_2_feature_3: SocialNotifications: A new bell icon alerts for new friend requests.
history.version_1_2_2_feature_4: ProfileDetailed Statistics: See time spent separated by anime, movies, and series.
history.version_1_2_2_feature_5: ProfileFavorites by Category and Highlights: Favorite sections for each list and a "Main Favorite" system.
history.version_1_2_2_feature_6: SharingSharing Cards by List: New vertical design and the ability to generate an image for each statistics list.
history.version_1_2_2_feature_7: SocialFriend Comparison: New screen to compare stats and affinities with friends through charts.
history.manual_add_feature: GeneralImplemented the Add Item Manually feature, allowing the creation of custom entries in any list.
history.edit_title_author_improvement: InterfaceAdded the ability to edit the title and author/publisher for items in all lists.
history.progress_input_improvement: ProgressFixed the 'Read' and 'Played' input for Books and Games on the main list.
history.leading_zero_fix: InterfaceFixed a visual bug where the leading '0' did not disappear when focusing on progress fields.
history.friends_feature: SocialImplemented full Friends functionality (search, add, accept, and remove).
history.user_profile_feature: SocialThe old "Dashboard" was transformed into a full User Profile page.
history.share_stats_feature: SharingAdded an option on the profile to generate and share an image with statistics.
history.search_priority_fix: SearchAnime search was improved to prioritize results with the exact name.
history.status_sorting_fix: SortingSorting by status was fixed to follow the logical order.
